pull.title: [trivial] Add required package dependencies for depends cross compilation
pull.body:
Stumbled over this during a setup of a new depends compile system.
Related to #8913.

events.message:
Add required package dependencies for depends cross compilation
[skip-ci]

issue.title: [PORT] Depends cherries
issue.body:
Update of `src/depends`, this contain all the need code and dependencies to cross compile or to produce a statically linked binaries.

This is the list of the core PR included in the port:

https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8730
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8820
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/9114
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/9254
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/9469
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/9574
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/9646
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/10325
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/10779
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/10851
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11264
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11286
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11460
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11903
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11981
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11986
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11995
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12402
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12474
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12715
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12946

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -28,6 +28,18 @@ Common `host-platform-triplets` for cross compilation are:
 
 No other options are needed, the paths are automatically configured.
 
+Install the required dependencies: Ubuntu & Debian
+--------------------------------------------------
+
+For macOS/Win32/Win64 cross compilation:
+
+    sudo apt-get install curl librsvg2-bin libtiff-tools bsdmainutils cmake imagemagick libcap-dev libz-dev libbz2-dev mingw-w64 g++-mingw-w64 nsis zip python-setuptools
comments.body: I think this is duplicated from the windows build instructions, might be better to refer to there instead?
